name: Coconut Miracle Pure Premium Virgin Coconut Oil
description:
UK Certified organic boasting of 51% Lauric Acid, and other medium chain fatty acids which are essential for healthy living 0% Cholesterol
 our extra virgin coconut oil has a great taste and is mild enough to use in all your cooking & baking. Excellent as a body moisturizer, make up remover, hair enhancer/conditioner & for oil pulling.  (Coconut Miracle Organics, Pioneer Organic Coconut Retail Brand since 2011) *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
